item.title: No street lights are on., 16th October
item.description:

item.title: The drain cover noise, 16th October
item.description:
The drain in the middle of the road just down from 85 okehampton is so loud when any vehicle goes over it. The drain has collapsed. There was one fixed further down the road which wasn’t the issue !!! This is now keeping myself and family up at night

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Axminster Crescent, East Wickham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street light too bright and creating strange ground effect, 16th October
item.description:
Previously reported under refs 8004596 and 158264. The light has now been switched back on with exactly the same problem. It is far brighter than other lights in the area, and is also creating a strange pattern on the ground immediately below it. A shield was previously in place to prevent the bright light shining into the house next to it. This shield has not been reinstalled following the light replacement, and so the light is now also very intrusive into the living room and bedroom of the house. Please (1) lower the brightness, (2) fix the strange pattern created by the light, and (3) reinstall the shield.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Charlwood Street, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping hotspot, 16th October
item.description:
Fly-tipping has reappeared at the same location near [insert street name and nearest landmark]. As shown in the attached photos, the rubbish obstructs the pavement, compelling pedestrians to walk on the road. This is a persistent hotspot — it was only cleared two days ago after multiple reports. Please arrange prompt removal and consider installing a “No Fly-Tipping – £400 Fine” sign or CCTV deterrent to prevent further dumping.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anglesea Avenue, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: No street light in the night and morning, 16th October
item.description:
No street light and its very dark at 6.44am 15/10/2025 There is no street light from the beginning of Ripon Road junction until towards the end of the road towards woolwich common This is a high security risk as one can be mopped or robbed in the dark

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 118, Herbert Road, Shooters Hill, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drop-down bollard not being used, 16th October
item.description:
The drop-down bollard at the pedestrian entrance to Jubilee Country Park (beside number 357) has been in the down position for weeks. When not being accessed by park staff this is supposed to be in the up position and locked. Any person in a vehicle who did not have permission could gain access to the park whilst the drop-down bollard is not in use.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southborough Lane, Southborough, London
Report on FixMyStreet
